1.definition: concerning, befitting, or applying to individual citizens or to citizens as a whole [a duty] see also

2.definition: marked by public orderpeaceable in behavior

3.definition: of or relating to a legal system based on Roman law as opposed to the English common law see also the Judicial System in the back matter

4.definition: relating to private rights and to judicial proceedings in connection with themrelating to legal matters other than those characterized as criminal [a action] [a infraction]

6.definition: of, relating to, or involving the general public, their activities, needs, ways, or civic affairs as distinguished from special (as military or religious) affairs [the authorities] [the service]
